dialogue.text: You awaken in a large field surrounded by flowers and odd flora you don't recognize
You're light headed and can't remember much.
You hear someone calling for you from a distance

dialogue.name: Stranger
dialogue.text: You lost pal, haven't seen your face before. You look injured, are you okay?
Asked the man that appears to be local...hunter, maybe, you aren't sure

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: Uhh, yeah. I'm fine. Where..Where am I?

dialogue.name: Man
dialogue.text: Where are you? We're at [???] plains, near [town name]. You someplace to go? I can bring you to mu hut get some food

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: Sure, that would be great, lead the way
